name: In re ESTATE of Lydia H. HAMILTON, Deceased. Appeal of John A. HAMILTON

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
parties: In re ESTATE of Lydia H. HAMILTON, Deceased. Appeal of John A. HAMILTON.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed.
Each side to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Martin W. Sheerer, Dillman, Sheerer & Schuchert, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Cioyd R. Mellott, G. Robert Moore, Eckert, Seamans, Cherin & Mellott, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
386 A.2d 535
In re ESTATE of Lydia H. HAMILTON, Deceased. Appeal of John A. HAMILTON.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 20, 1978.
Decided May 15, 1978.
Martin W. Sheerer, Dillman, Sheerer & Schuchert, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Cioyd R. Mellott, G. Robert Moore, Eckert, Seamans, Cherin & Mellott, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
